donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Output 1:Skills developed and employment generated for youth, particularly women, in the garment industry.
Output 2: Increased capacity of local consultancy / training service providers built to train workers and middle management in the textile / garment value chain
Output 3: Evidence based research undertaken to inform relevant policies and programmes of the Government and garment industry.

project_descr: Promoting Employment & Productivity in Garment Industry (PEPGI)
project_title: Promoting Employment & Productivity in Garment Industry
